title: Type/Logo for Medical Offices
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125058im_/http:/typophile.com/files/65190142-1_4652.png)

Customer wants this image on a 5'x3' banner. Images were easy to recreate, the text, not so much.

Any help is appreciated!

Font: 

 Walkway Condensed Bold 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125058/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content: **[Walkway Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125058/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Walkway%20Condensed%20Bold%20-%20Regular&fid=591e4e5a7925a1968e555176575cb91c&fsize=60&text=Rocky%20Mountain%20Family%20Practice&wrap=2)** free font by Graham Meade looks like a good match
